allActions.name: Artist Touch
allActions.description: You summon forth a splash of ink or paint at one target within 15ft attempting to blind them. The creature must make a Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of their next turn.

allActions.name: Lightning Lure
allActions.description: You create a lash of lightning energy that strikes at one creature of your choice that you can see within 15 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet in a straight line toward you and then take 1d8 lightning damage if it is within 5 feet of you.

allActions.name: Light's Embrace
allActions.description: A creature of your choice within range begins to glow with brilliant light, which causes them to shed bright light for 5ft, and dim light for another 5ft. During the spell's duration, creatures that can see the light have disadvantage on attack rolls that target that creature.

allActions.name: Cunning Action
allActions.description: This action can be used only to take the Dash, Disengage, Hide, make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check, use your thieves' tools to disarm a trap or open a lock, or take the Use an Object action.

allActions.name: Steady Aim
allActions.description: You give yourself advantage on your next attack roll on the current turn. You can use this bonus action only if you haven't moved during this turn, and after you use the bonus action, your speed is 0 until the end of the current turn.

allActions.name: Command Kee
allActions.description: To preform any action or force strike range 30ft

allActions.name: Glide
allActions.description: When you fall at least 10 feet above the ground, you can use your reaction to extend your skin membranes to glide horizontally a number of feet equal to your walking speed, and you take 0 damage from the fall. You determine the direction of the glide.

allActions.name: Sneak Attack
allActions.description: attack roll with adv or ally within 5ft add 2d6 damage

allActions.name: Brooch of Shielding
allActions.description: resistance to physic damage and immune to magic missile
